Lyric:
[by:蜥蜴沼质]
[ti:How To Love]
[ar:Cash Cash、Sofia Reyes]
[al:Blood, Sweat & 3 Years]
[00:00.14]One two three
[00:01.79]I've been running from the pain
[00:03.73]Trying not to feel the same
[00:05.58]But it's a shame that we're sinking
[00:09.79]See, my confidence is shaking
[00:11.64]And my heart is feeling vacant
[00:13.80]So you try to fill it in
[00:17.79]You say "I could fix the broken in your heart
[00:21.51]You're worth saving darling"
[00:25.84]But I don't know why you're shooting in the dark
[00:29.40]I got faith in nothing
[00:33.65]But love, pray for me
[00:38.71]I never had somebody
[00:40.56]So I don't know how to love
[00:43.72]Pray for me
[00:46.77]I know I need somebody
[00:48.61]So I can learn how to love
[01:06.08]I know it's been a while
[01:08.40]Cause my memory's on trial
[01:10.35]For the way I used to be
[01:14.45]My head is running miles
[01:16.25]Round in circles and I try
[01:18.16]To find the little light in me
[01:22.61]You say "I could fix the broken in your heart
[01:25.77]You're worth saving darling"
[01:30.37]But I don't know why you're shooting in the dark
[01:33.98]I got faith in nothing
[01:38.44]But love, pray for me
[01:42.90]I never had somebody
[01:45.16]So I don't know how to love
[01:48.67]Pray for me
[01:51.26]I know I need somebody
[01:53.16]So I can learn how to love
[02:13.61]I know I need somebody
[02:17.56]I know I need somebody
[02:21.52]I know I need somebody
[02:25.58]So I can learn how to love
[02:30.64]How to love
[02:32.74]How to love
[02:33.69]So I can learn how to love
[02:35.19]How to love
[02:36.88]How to love
[02:38.74]How to love, love, love, love, love, love, love, oh
[02:56.29]I know I need somebody
[02:57.88]I know I need somebody
[03:12.09]I know I need somebody
[03:14.00]So I can learn how to love
[03:20.47](Need somebody now
[03:23.57]How to love, love
[03:27.18]How to love, love)
